scripts.start:web: rm -rf ./react-client/.env.development && cp ./react-client/.env.$STAGE ./react-client/.env.development && amplify env checkout $STAGE && npm run watch && cd ./react-client && npm start
scripts.deploy:web: amplify env checkout $STAGE && npm run build:amplify && git add . && git commit -am 'deploy' --no-verify && git push
scripts.start:native: amplify env checkout $STAGE && npm run watch && cd ./react-native-client && expo start
scripts.deploy:native: amplify env checkout $STAGE && npm run build:amplify && cd ./react-native-client && expo publish --release-channel $STAGE
scripts.build:ios: amplify env checkout $STAGE && npm run build:amplify && cd ./react-native-client && expo build:ios --release-channel $STAGE
scripts.build:android: amplify env checkout $STAGE && npm run build:amplify && cd ./react-native-client && expo build:android --release-channel $STAGE
scripts.upload:ios: amplify env checkout $STAGE && cd ./react-native-client && expo upload:ios
scripts.deploy:service:base: amplify env checkout $STAGE && npm run build:amplify && cd ./services/base && serverless deploy --stage $STAGE
scripts.deploy:service:base:function: amplify env checkout $STAGE && npm run build:amplify && cd ./services/base && serverless deploy function -f $F --stage $STAGE
